00006 template <typename T> class CyclicVector
00007 {
00008 private:
00009     std::vector<T> source;
00010 
00011 public:
00012 
00013     class iterator
00014     {
00015     private:
00016         CyclicVector<T>*  iterSource;
00017         unsigned int currentIndex;
00018 
00019     public:
00020         iterator(CyclicVector<T>*  vec) : currentIndex(0)
00021         {
00022             iterSource = vec;
00023         }
00024 
00025         iterator(CyclicVector<T>*  vec, const unsigned int& index) : currentIndex(index)
00026         {
00027             iterSource = vec;
00028         }
00029 
00030         T& operator * ()
00031         {
00032             while (currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00033                 currentIndex -= iterSource->size();
00034 
00035             return iterSource->at(currentIndex);
00036         }
00037 
00038         void operator ++ ()
00039         {
00040             while (currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00041                 currentIndex -= iterSource->size();
00042 
00043             if (++currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00044                 currentIndex = 0;
00045         }
00046 
00047         void operator += (const int& value)
00048         {
00049             currentIndex += value;
00050 
00051             while (currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00052                 currentIndex -= iterSource->size();
00053 
00054             while (currentIndex < 0)
00055                 currentIndex += iterSource->size();
00056         }
00057 
00058         iterator operator + (const unsigned int& n)
00059         {
00060             int tmp = currentIndex + n;
00061 
00062             while (tmp >= iterSource->size())
00063                 tmp -= iterSource->size();
00064 
00065             return iterator(iterSource, tmp);
00066         }
00067 
00068         void operator -- ()
00069         {
00070             while (currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00071                 currentIndex -= iterSource->size();
00072 
00073             if (--currentIndex < 0)
00074                 currentIndex = iterSource->size() - 1;
00075         }
00076 
00077         void operator -= (const int& value)
00078         {
00079             currentIndex -= value;
00080 
00081             while (currentIndex >= iterSource->size())
00082                 currentIndex -= iterSource->size();
00083 
00084             while (currentIndex < 0)
00085                 currentIndex += iterSource->size();
00086         }
00087 
00088         iterator& operator - (const unsigned int& n)
00089         {
00090             int tmp = currentIndex - n;
00091 
00092             while (tmp < 0)
00093                 tmp += iterSource->size();
00094 
00095             return iterator(iterSource, tmp);
00096         }
00097 
00098         const bool operator != (const CyclicVector<T>::iterator& toTest)
00099         {
00100             if (currentIndex != toTest.currentIndex || iterSource != toTest.iterSource)
00101                 return true;
00102             else
00103                 return false;
00104         }
00105 
00106         const bool operator == (const iterator& toTest)
00107         {
00108             if (getIndex() == toTest.getIndex() && iterSource == toTest.iterSource)
00109                 return true;
00110             else
00111                 return false;
00112         }
00113 
00114         const unsigned int getIndex()
00115         {
00116             return currentIndex;
00117         }
00118     };
00119 
00120      const std::vector<T>& getSource(){ return source;}
00121 
00122     T& at(unsigned int index)
00123     {
00124         while (index >= source.size())
00125             index -= source.size();
00126 
00127         return source[index];
00128     }
00129 
00130     T& operator [](unsigned int index)
00131     {
00132         return this->at(index);
00133     }
00134 
00135     T& front()
00136     {
00137         return source.front();
00138     }
00139 
00140     T& back()
00141     {
00142         return source.back();
00143     }
00144 
00145     iterator begin()
00146     {
00147         return iterator(this);
00148     }
00149 
00150     iterator end()
00151     {
00152         return iterator(this, source.size() - 1);
00153     }
00154 
00155     const size_t capacity()
00156     {
00157         return source.capacity();
00158     }
00159

00161     {
00162         source.reserve(size);
00163     }
00164

00167             source.resize(num);
00168     }

00171     {
00172         return source.size();
00173     }

00176     {
00177         source.clear();
00178     }

00180     const bool empty()
00181     {
00182         return source.empty();
00183     }
00184 
00185     iterator insert(const iterator& loc, const T& val)
00186     {
00187         source.insert(source.begin() + loc.getIndex(), val);
00188     }
00189 
00190     void erase(iterator loc)
00191     {
00192         source.erase(source.begin() + loc.getIndex());
00193     }
00194 
00195     T& pop_back()
00196     {
00197         T ret = source.back();
00198         source.pop_back();
00199         return ret;
00200     }
00201 
00202     void push_back(const T& val)
00203     {

00205     }
